title: Confused by modern idioms?
description: Having a Groundhog Day? Keen to break the internet? Learn some modern idioms.

vocabItems.definition: (idiom) give in; surrender; stop doing something because you realise you cannot succeed
Groundhog Day(idiom) a situation in which events that have happened before, happen again in exactly the same way
(idiom) cause so much excitement about something online that many people visit the website, making it crash
(idiom) a problem that does not seem very important when compared to the serious problems faced by people in poorer parts of the world
